author: oheger
msg: Fixed a failing test case related to event listener registration.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked event listener registration in BasicConfigurationBuilder.
New methods have been added to register listeners of the new type. The old
methods for adding configuration listeners have been deprecated.

author: oheger
msg: Added an addAll() method to EventListenerList.
This method copies the content of one list with event listeners to another

author: oheger
msg: Added a clear() method to EventListenerList.

author: oheger
msg: Extended EventListenerList to query registration information.
A method was added which returns an unmodifiable list with event listener
